content:
For the CG connectathon we want to provide a server and tooling using the latest ballot version of our IG: 1.1.0
I can't find this in the fhir package regitry, so i'm assuming, that ballot packages aren't distributed via the package infrastructure?
For the participants of our connectathon track packages on the package infrastructure would be very helpful
it certainly should be, if it's publisehd
something has done wrong in the publishing process, and it hasn't made it into the feed
Thanks for the info. Where/Who do i have to poke to get it into the feed?
me, but I won't be able to do it until Tuesday
